meanings.sent1: She always preselects her outfit for the next day before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: The teacher preselects the best students for the science fair.
meanings.sent3: The robot preselects its favorite snacks before the party.
meanings.sent4: His intuition preselects the winning lottery numbers.
meanings.sent5: The chef preselects the freshest ingredients for the special dish.

meanings.sent1: Before the trip, they preselects the places they want to visit.
